snippet.title: Horizon's Mirage - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Horizon's Mirage: Early Announcement Trailer
► Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2579510/Horizons_Mirage
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/Daniel_HPG

► Demo launch trailer: https://youtu.be/oGlok4JfiH0

Horizon's Mirage is a first-person parkour set in a futuristic cityscape surrounded by skyscrapers.
Progress through checkpoints, conquer dynamic obstructions, explore alternative paths and gather collectables to unlock time reduction, dashing, teleporting and more.

While the primary goal is reaching the checkpoints, players will discover alternative paths that lead to valuable collectibles. These collectibles contribute to unlocking new skills, enhancing your parkour abilities, and granting access to previously inaccessible areas.

Current features in development:
• Single player
• Checkpoint system
• Exploring alternative paths and collecting points
• Unlocking skills like time reduction, air-dash, teleporting and more

⁕ The game is still in very early stage of development and a lot of changes will be made.

#horizonsmirage #3dplatfomer #development
